IX.iii.2.C.6.
a
.
Referring Claims to the Rating Activity
Refer aid and attendance (A&A) and housebound claims filed by Section 306 and Old-Law pensioners to the rating activity unless prohibited by the information below.
title: M21-1, Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 2, Section C - Elections Between Pension Programs
citation: Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 2, Section C
